content.description: It starts as a sit start with hands matched on the lower jug left of Gettin' Lippy then one move out to the horizontal lip. Then the crux is getting around it (the lip), and that's the top-out. The few feet left up the boulder isn't really worth going up.
content.location: Starts sds on the lower jug to the left of Gettin' Lippy...

content.description: Sit start with your hands matched on the lower jug then to hole in the rock - you'll see it. Then up to a nice crimp out towards the lip of the boulder, then comes the crux. A big throw out left then some strong moves getting around the lip using a solid crack to crimp above... now theres two top out variations one goes to the left and stops on the shelf half way up, or go towards the right and that will take you to the top.
content.protection: A couple of crash pads. There's a few rocks in the landing area.
content.location: Sit start on the lower jug to the right of the overhang then to hole in the rock - you'll see it.
